description: Mentioned only by Irwin, who says: �Solo Saxophone and Major Saxophone are sometimes seen on stop keys on the larger theater organs.� He gives no definition; we can only assume these are Saxophone stops of particularly prominent voicing. Examples None known. Contributions welcome. Bibliography Irwin[1]: Saxophone. FOOTER Original site compiled by Edward L. Stauff. For educational use only.
